title: Pistorius Sentenced To Five Years In Prison For Culpable Homicide
teaser: Audie Cornish speaks with reporter Nastaysya Tay from Pretoria, South Africa, about the sentencing of runner Oscar Pistorius in the killing of his girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp. He was sentenced to five years in prison.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
